story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a seasoned designer with a fascinating 15-year journey in the world of product design and manufacturing. This creative professional's story begins in Brazil, where they earned a Bachelor of Laws with a focus on contracts from Universidade Candido Mendes, before pursuing their passion for design at Santa Monica College, where they obtained an Associate of Arts in Interior and Furniture Design.

Speaking fluently in Portuguese and English, with a working knowledge of Spanish, this designer has built a career that spans continents and disciplines. Their most recent chapter began in 2014 as a Designer, where they brought clients' dreams to life through custom furniture creation. Armed with AutoCAD expertise and an eye for detail, they managed everything from initial sketches to final production, ensuring each piece met exact specifications and quality standards.

Before this, they spent eight impactful years as a Senior Production Manager from 2006 to 2014, where they orchestrated entire production teams and became the go-to person for custom quotes in the Formations product line. They worked closely with R&D teams, maintained vendor relationships, and kept the production process running smoothly while maintaining high-quality standards.

Their earlier role as a Project Manager from 2004 to 2005 saw them handling space and furniture planning, including a notable project at the Viceroy Hotel in Santa Monica. This position helped them develop their strong organizational and communication skills, while managing multiple stakeholders and complex project timelines.

Throughout their career, they've maintained proficiency in various design tools including AutoCAD, Adobe Photoshop, and 3D rendering, while developing expertise in material selection, color application, and vendor sourcing. Their unique combination of design creativity and management capability has made them particularly effective in dynamic, fast-paced environments where attention to detail and quality control are paramount.

What sets this professional apart is their ability to bridge the gap between creative vision and practical execution, ensuring that beautiful designs don't just remain on paper but become reality, all while meeting budgets and deadlines with precision.
